skills.name: Kalka Impact
skills.description: Kalka rushes forward, dealing damage equal to **1147%** of ATK to targets ahead and increases its own ATK by **10%** for 8 seconds.

skills.name: Kalka Laser
skills.description: Kalka begins charging up, then releases a concentrated laser blast ahead, dealing damage equal to **1147%** of ATK to targets ahead and restores its master's HP equal to **1613%** of their ATK.

skills.name: Kalka Fist
skills.description: Kalka punches forward with its left and right fists in succession, dealing 2 hits to enemies ahead, each hit dealing damage equal to **1147%** of ATK.

skills.name: Firebomb
skills.description: Void Angel raises its right arm, launching 4 Firebombs at enemies. Each Firebomb deals damage equal to **413%** of ATK to hit enemies.

skills.name: Flame Jet
skills.description: Void Angel raises both its arms, spewing out jets of flame, dealing 4 rounds of flame attacks to enemies ahead, each hit dealing damage equal to **413%** of ATK and additionally burning the enemies for damage equal to **118%** of ATK for 5 seconds. While being burned, the targets' outgoing healing is reduced by 50%.

skills.name: Angel's Wrath
skills.description: Void Angel lifts both arms, creating a ball of flame above its head, then smashes it toward enemies ahead, dealing damage equal to **413%** of ATK to hit enemies.

skills.name: Frozen Burst
skills.description: Angela raises both arms, creating a burst of ice at the enemies' location, dealing damage equal to **1481%** of ATK to hit enemies and causing them to become Frostbitten for 6 seconds.

skills.name: Angela Loves You!
skills.description: Angela lifts both arms, creating an ice ball above its head, then smashes it toward enemies ahead, dealing damage equal to **1481%** of ATK to hit enemies and causing them to become Frostbitten for 6 seconds.

skills.name: Angela's Flying Kick
skills.description: Angela flies up a distance, then swoops down with a flying kick, dealing damage equal to **1481%** of ATK to enemies in its path.

skills.name: Moonrabbit Flurry
skills.description: Moonrabbit begins spinning and rushes forward, using its electrified arms to deal 6 rounds of volt attacks to nearby enemies, each hit dealing damage equal to **244%** of ATK.

skills.name: Moonrabbit Shot
skills.description: Moonrabbit fires large electric projectiles from its arms, dealing 3 rounds of volt attacks to enemies ahead, each hit dealing damage equal to **244%** of ATK and granting its master a shield equal to **573%** of their ATK for 5 seconds.

skills.name: Furious Rage
skills.description: Moonrabbit brings thunder and lightning down around itself, dealing 6 rounds of volt attacks to surrounding enemies, each hit dealing damage equal to **244%** of ATK.

skills.name: Flame Breath
skills.description: Flame Sparrow breathes fire at the enemy 3 times, dealing damage equal to **733%** of ATK each time.

skills.name: Flame Bomb
skills.description: Flame Sparrow flies for a period of time, then drops the firebomb from its claw at the enemy, dealing damage equal to **733%** of ATK.

skills.name: Flame Dive
skills.description: Flame Sparrow flies up a distance, then transforms into a phoenix and swoops down, dealing damage equal to **733%** of ATK to the enemy.

skills.name: Pop Cannon
skills.description: The drinks Mi-a carries not only can be used to feed Wanderers, but can also be used to refill energy bullets. The energy bullet can deal damage equal to **1225%** of ATK once it hits the enemy.

skills.name: Mi-a's Flare
skills.description: Mi-a gathers and charges the energy into a beam, dealing damage equal to **1225%** of ATK once it hits the enemy.

skills.name: Chopping Board
skills.description: Mi-a generates a temporary chopping board that she learns from her daily cooking habit and uses it as an energy board to smash the enemy, dealing damage equal to **1225%** of ATK to the enemy on hit and reducing their speed by 20% for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Dragon's Bead
skills.description: Zongyun focuses his power of lightning into an orb to attack enemies. Upon landing a hit, the orb releases a large amount of lightning, dealing damage equal to **2491%** of ATK to enemies in the area.

skills.name: Thundercaller
skills.description: Zongyun summons thunder to strike enemies ahead, dealing damage equal to **2491%** of ATK 5 times.

skills.name: Rings of Thunder
skills.description: Zongyun creates two thunderous rings at its tail and tosses them at the enemies. Each ring deals damage equal to **2491%** of ATK.

skills.name: Frost Talon
skills.description: Leia flings a series of Frost Talons, dealing 2 hits that each deal damage equal to **852%** of ATK. She then shoots out a stream of interlaced claw marks that deals damage equal to **852%** of ATK.

skills.name: Frozen Wings
skills.description: Leia slices through enemies with wings made of concentrated frost, dealing damage equal to **852% **of ATK 2 times.

skills.name: Ice Cyclone
skills.description: Leia summons an Ice Cyclone at the enemy's position that lasts for 5 seconds, dealing damage equal to **852%** of ATK every 0.5 seconds.

skills.name: Frost Spikes
skills.description: Snowy claps her hands, gathering six ice spikes around her then swings her hands, launching the ice spikes in two batches, with each spike dealing damage equal to **363%** of ATK to the enemy hit.

skills.name: Extreme Cold
skills.description: Snowy flies upward, creating an ice cone at the enemy's location, dealing damage equal to **363%** of ATK. The ice cone then shatters, dealing damage equal to **995%** of ATK.

skills.name: Leave Snowy Alone!
skills.description: Snowy raises her hands, launching a massive ice sphere above her head to smash down on enemies, dealing damage equal to **363%** of ATK.
